{{Extra album cover
| Upper caption = Premium Edition Type = studio Cover = Strong premium

}} {{Extra album cover
| Upper caption = Oriflame Edition Type = studio Cover = Strong oriflame
| edition.jpg
}} }} 'Strong' is the title of the 2010 studio album by German singer-songwriter
& producer Thomas Anders.

On 27 January 2010, Thomas Anders said: "The album is nearly ready and will
appear first in Russia where I still have a great amount of fans, and in Germany
the release is planned for summer".

Strong reached Platinum status in Russia for sales of more than 20,000
units.
